##144p #1
```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np    
df=pd.read_csv("data/mpg.csv")
df.head
df["displ"] #데이터뽑기
low=df.query("displ<=4") #정해진 데이터 뽑기 안됨 조건문만 가능
high=df.query("displ>=5")

high["hwy"]
print(np.mean(low["hwy"]))
print(np.mean(high["hwy"]))
np.mean(low["hwy"])
np.mean(low["hwy"]) >=np.mean(high["hwy"])


```

au
